text:
[Verse]
Neon lights
Streets aglow
Endless faces I don't know
Crowds are talking
Weaving threads
Concrete jungle in my head

[Verse 2]
Cars are rushing
Blurred lines
Skyscrapers reaching up high
Footsteps echo
City hum
In this maze
I'm feeling numb

[Chorus]
Lost in the city
I roam
Looking for a place called home
Echoes of a thousand dreams
Lost in the city's gleam

[Verse 3]
Bright cafes
Hidden lanes
Raindrops falling on windowpanes
Strangers passing
Fleeting glance
In the night
I take my chance

[Bridge]
Stars are hiding
City glow
Underneath
The rivers flow
Heartbeat racing
Streets alive
In this chaos
I survive

[Chorus]
Lost in the city
I roam
Looking for a place called home
Echoes of a thousand dreams
Lost in the city's gleam
title: Lost in the City
